# WKInterfaceDeviceCrownOrientation

**Enumeration**

Constants indicating the crown orientation from the user’s perspective.

## Declaration

```swift
enum WKInterfaceDeviceCrownOrientation
```

## Constants

- **WKInterfaceDeviceCrownOrientation.left**: The left side of the device.
- **WKInterfaceDeviceCrownOrientation.right**: The right side of the device.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Reading the Device Settings

- **name**: The name of the device.
- **model**: The model information for the device.
- **localizedModel**: The localized version of the model information.
- **wristLocation**: The wrist on which the user wears the Apple Watch.
- **WKInterfaceDeviceWristLocation**: Constants indicating the wrist on which the user wears the Apple Watch.
- **crownOrientation**: The side on which the crown is positioned.
- **preferredContentSizeCategory**: The preferred font-sizing option.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
